objectives: Ferry the Hurricanes to Malta. Reduce the aircraft capacity of Cagliari airfield.

scenarioSquadron.title: Ferry Hurricanes
scenarioSquadron.description: Ferry Hurricanes from Argus to Malta

scenarioAirfield.title: Damage Cagliari Airfield
scenarioAirfield.description: Reduce the Cagliari airfield's capacity by a single step

scenarioAirfield.title: Repair Cagliari Airfield
scenarioAirfield.description: Italians repair a damaged Cagliari airfield's capacity by a single step
